## Welcome to the Template!

### This template automatically renders and deploys

This repository is set up as a template for creating Quarto RevealJS presentations with automatic deployment to GitHub Pages.

- Every push to the main branch automatically renders the presentation
- The rendered slides are deployed to GitHub Pages
- You can view your presentation at: `https://[username].github.io/[repository-name]/`

To use this template:
1. Click "Use this template" on GitHub
2. Clone your new repository
3. Edit `template.qmd` with your content
4. Push changes to trigger automatic deployment

## Additional theme classes

### Some extra things you can do with the clean theme

Special classes for emphasis

- `.alert` class for default emphasis, e.g. [important note]{.alert}.
- `.fg` class for custom colour, e.g. [important note]{.fg style="--col: #e64173"}.
- `.bg` class for custom background, e.g. [important note]{.bg style="--col: #e64173"}.

Cross-references

- `.button` class provides a Beamer-like button, e.g.
[[Summary]{.button}](#sec-summary)

## Interactive Features

### Keyboard shortcuts for enhanced presentation

This template now includes several interactive features:

**Drawing and Notes:**
- Press **`c`** to open the chalkboard for drawing
- Press **`b`** to toggle the notes canvas
- Press **`s`** to open speaker view with notes

**Navigation:**
- Press **`r`** to toggle scroll view mode
- Press **`f`** for fullscreen mode
- Press **`o`** for slide overview

**Additional Tools:**
- Press **`?`** for keyboard help
- Press **`Esc`** to exit any mode

::: {.notes}
This is a speaker note that will only be visible in speaker view (press 's'). You can add presenter notes to any slide using this format.
:::

### Multiplex Support

To enable multiplex (synchronized presentations across multiple devices):

1. Set `multiplex: true` in your YAML configuration
2. Add your socket.io server URL and secret
3. Example configuration:
```yaml
format:
  clean-revealjs:
    multiplex:
      url: 'https://reveal-multiplex.glitch.me/'
      secret: 'your-secret-key'
      id: 'your-presentation-id'
```

## Template Features

### Easy customization and automatic deployment

This template is designed to be simple yet powerful:

**Template Benefits:**
- Automated deployment with every push
- No manual setup required after initial configuration  
- Clean, professional theme included
- Responsive design works on all devices

**Next Steps:**
- Edit this file (`template.qmd`) with your content
- Customize the theme colors in `_extensions/clean/clean.scss`
- Add your own images to the repository
- Push to GitHub and watch it deploy automatically!
